<Text: Rawatpara is one of the oldest localities of the historic city of Agra.>

2:
--------------------
Text: Rawatpara:  Rawatpara draws its name from the title Rawat.
Triplets:<Rawatpara
3:
--------------------
Text: Rawatpara:  The Hindi dictionary meaning of the word "Rawat" conveys expressions that are akin to titles that used to be conferred by the Mughal emperors upon those whom they considered to be worthy of their salt.

Text: Rawatpara:  Out of his gratitude Akbar conferred the title of RAWAT upon this Brahmin.
